projects.title: M.Sc. Project - Time Series momentum trading strategy - Algorithmic Trading
projects.description: 1. Analysed the autocorrelation amplification of Moving Average Trading rule and its mathematical model on detrended price process time series. Empirically found out that MA rule amplifies the autocorrelation in the underlying process and higher the amplification, more profitable the rule is.2. Strategized and calculated the MA rule parameters for distinct levels of autocorrelation using Ljung-box statistic for optimum profitability. Simulated an AR(1) series as price process and applied MA bear rule (MA(l,s)) by varying both autocorrelation and the 's' parameter to calculate optimal parameter for high amplification, measured using LB statistic3. Applied Moving average rule to 11 years data of S&P 500 Index providing empirical evidence of autocorrelation amplification
